just for the most of the porn torrents here are legit as far as no password, no gimmicks to download. most of them do contain url files in the DL that they may get some money out of but you never have to open those, and the pic are what is promised. you do get the scam ones in all the categories
I should say many contain not most. for example the guys doing met art and many other sets typically do not include anything but the pics and info files
